quote: I traded Spanish lessons for help fixing my car. Neither of us had money, but we both got what we needed.
name: Ana M.

quote: As a retiree, I felt useless. Now I mentor young engineers and get help with my garden. I feel valuable again.
name: Robert K.

quote: The traditional gig economy takes 20-30%. Here, 100% of the value goes to the people doing the work.
name: Priya S.

quote: As a new immigrant, I couldn't find work in my field. OpenEconomy let me use my skills while I rebuilt.
name: Yuki T.
